resources.string:
INSTRUCTIONS: 

 * You are advised to take the demo test to familiarise yourself with the test environment before taking the exam. 

 * You have 60 minutes to answer 70 questions. 

 * Please make sure you are in a quiet environment where you won	 be disturbed through out the test. 

 * Please make sure nobody assists you in taking the test and that you don't cheat. 

 * Make sure you do not cancel the app or the test at any point because you won't be able to resume the test. 

 * You are advised to make sure your phone is fully charged before taking the test. 

 * Try not to minimize or close the app or else you might loose the test session. 

 * Top candidates on the leader board are eligible to win awesome prices periodically. 

 * We won't end this without saying Goodluck.
